price: E, não fora uma Palavra antecipada de teu Senhor e um termo designado, haver-lhes-ia sido imposto o castigo.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musamman
